00052 #ifndef _nt_timing_obj_h_
00053 #define _nt_timing_obj_h_
00054 
00055 #include <ctime>
00056 // for clock() and CLOCKS_PER_SEC
00057 
00058 #include "nt_main.h"
00059 #include "nt_obj.h"
00060 #include "nt_types.h"
00061 
00062 
00073 class NT_timing_o : public NT_o {
00074     private:
00075         NTbool isRunning;
00076         NTdouble last_time;
00077         NTdouble total;
00078 
00079     public:
00080         NT_timing_o(){ reset(); secs_per_tick = 1.0 / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;}
00081         void reset() { isRunning = false; last_time = 0.0; total=0.0; }
00082         void start() { if (!isRunning) { last_time = seconds(); isRunning = true;}}
00083         NTdouble stop()  { if (isRunning) 
00084                             {
00085                                 total += seconds() - last_time; 
00086                                 isRunning = false;
00087                              }
00088                           return total; 
00089                         }
00090         NTdouble read()   {  if (isRunning) 
00091                             {
00092                                 total+= seconds() - last_time;
00093                                 last_time = seconds();
00094                             }
00095                            return total;
00096                         }       
00097        NTdouble seconds() { return ( (NTdouble) clock() ) * secs_per_tick;}                 
00098      private:
00099      NTdouble secs_per_tick; 
00100 };
00101 
00102 
00103 
00104 #endif /* _nt_timing_obh_h_ */
